Index.title: ESLint Rule Generator
Index.description2: Help you generate a custom eslint rule
Index.slogan: Too stressed Out to Write Github README? Let me help you!
Index.step1: Give a brief description of your eslint rule
Index.placeholder: "帐号" and "账户" are not allowed to be used, "账号" and "账户" are recommended instead.
Index.privacyPolicy1: Do not upload too private content, details check
Index.prompt: Please help me write an ESLint rule. Only provide the rule code(include name, meta, create fields), the rule's requirements: {description}.
Index.code_tip: The rule validates correct code as pass and incorrect code as fail. Here are the examples of correct and incorrect code:
Index.notice: Now the service will be unstable due to the surge in visits, so you can first collect this website and use it in your spare time. Everyone is too enthusiastic, and the projects released at random have received far more attention than expected.
Index.settingsOpenAIKeyTip: Configuration data will only exist in the browser, please feel free to use it!
